offer1.title: Business Intelligence (BI)
offer1.text: Development of interactive dashboards and automated reports to support data-driven decisions.

offer2.title: Process Automation (low-code)
offer2.text: Implementation of automated workflows that remove repetitive tasks, improve traceability, and reduce operational errors.

offer3.title: Custom Web Solutions
offer3.text: Internal web applications tailored to specific needs (task control, CRM, operational management, etc.).

offer4.title: Technology Maturity Assessment
offer4.text: Evaluation of the digital landscape and a roadmap for digitization, automation, and scalability.

offer5.title: Training & Support
offer5.text: Hands-on training on delivered tools and technical guidance to ensure adoption and growth.
